item.title: Uncopyright
item.description: On Tuesday I was sitting in my favorite coffee shop in Austin and I felt inspired to record my podcast. I grabbed my fancy microphone out of my bag and started to set it up to record when I noticed something: Tomâ€™s had the Beatles playing.
